span.p: On April 20, Governor DeWine ordered the continued closure of K-12 school buildings through the end of the 2019-20 school year. Boardman Schools will continue remote instruction.

img.alt: Safety Village 2019-20

div.a: SENIORS CLASS OF 2020: YARD SIGNS ARE READY TO GO!

img.alt: boardman senior 2020 yard signs stacked on tables for delivery

span.strong: Boardman senior class of 2020, your signs are ready to go!

They will be delivered to your yard on Wednesday, April 22. Dozens of our volunteers--your teachers, counselors, administrators, and so many others who love you--will be delivering the signs in the early afternoon.

a.title: Click to read more about: SENIORS CLASS OF 2020: YARD SIGNS ARE READY TO GO!

div.a: Read More about SENIORS CLASS OF 2020: YARD SIGNS ARE READY TO GO!
BOARDMAN MEAL DISTRIBUTIONS EVERY MONDAY UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

img.alt: MEAL DISTRIBUTION AT BHS WITH RYAN STACKING TABLES

span.p: All children, regardless of income, from the ages of 1-18 are eligible for meals: 5 breakfasts and 5 lunches for the week. Children should be present. A drive-thru type of pickup from Doors 8 & 9 (North).

span.span: will be the next Scheduled Meal Distribution.

a.title: Click to read more about: BOARDMAN MEAL DISTRIBUTIONS EVERY MONDAY UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

div.a: Read More about BOARDMAN MEAL DISTRIBUTIONS EVERY MONDAY UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
Notice of Capital Improvement Project: West Boulevard Elementary

img.alt: capital improvement graphic with hard hat and measuring tape

p.span: Bids are being accepted for construction of a faculty parking lot and access drive at West Boulevard Elementary School.
to see legal notice of project specifications.

div.a: KINDERGARTEN REGISTRATION UPDATE: APRIL 21

img.alt: Kindergarten registration 2020-21

strong.span: Attention parents of kindergarten aged students not yet enrolled for the 2020-21 school year. Boardman Local Schools encourages you to get the enrollment process started as soon as possible.

a.title: Click to read more about: KINDERGARTEN REGISTRATION UPDATE: APRIL 21

div.a: Read More about KINDERGARTEN REGISTRATION UPDATE: APRIL 21
Message From Superintendent Saxton: April 17

img.alt: new update graphic

p.span: The purpose of this message is to remind all school families that distance learning and online instruction will resume on Monday, April 20th. Individual details about online instruction and paper packets will be communicated to families from their building principal or child's teacher.

a.title: Click to read more about: Message From Superintendent Saxton: April 17

div.a: Read More about Message From Superintendent Saxton: April 17

strong.span: A group from Sunrise Senior Living visited Robinwood Elementary School in September, and joined in a gym class with kindergarten students. It was part of Sunrise's "Move 4 LIfe" campaign. Sunrise has 300 facilities across the nation, and on this day, each location had a group join in similar fun at schools across the country. Robinwood students were overjoyed to host them for a relay race.

img.alt: Senior citizens from sunrise Senior Living at the entrance of Robinwood Elementary
Loraine and a group of students share a snack after the relay races
